snippets.excerpt: Tiefling Dream Archivist who curates forbidden wing, recording dreams as primary sources. Speaks in hushed present-tense. Eyes glaze when playing back nightmares. Offers secrets in exchange for players' dreams.
snippets.conflict_hook: Demonic patron demands redaction of history to glorify infernal dynasty. Needs protection during public reading.
rp_cues: eyes glaze when playing back nightmares

snippets.excerpt: Dwarven Tunnel Monk, former mercenary running meditation monastery in magma ducts. Calm, grounded voice. Pauses mid-sentence for volcanic-steam breaths. Offers tea before combat.
snippets.conflict_hook: Iron Syndicate wants tunnels for smuggling and threatens students. Requests PCs intercept negotiators.

snippets.excerpt: Human Itinerant Judge travels with clockwork scale weighing intention, not coins. Formal diction, references precedent. Taps scale for emphasis. Deputizes PCs with parchment badges.
snippets.conflict_hook: Corrupt nobles hired assassins to silence verdicts. Needs escort through noble territory. Scale predicts crimes.

equipment: Intention Scale (detect evil & good at will)

snippets.excerpt: Elven Meteor Shepherd nets falling stars into crystal kites for spellcasters. Laughs in meteorological metaphors. Jingles with orbiting motes. Names each shooting star familiars lovingly.
snippets.conflict_hook: Astral Port Authority accuses evading cosmic import taxes. Needs legal counsel or smugglers. Meteor shower becomes set-piece chase.

snippets.excerpt: Halfling River Warden guards floating temple barge with refugees. Warm, motherly. Flicks water off fingertips to illustrate. Hums lullabies that magically calm.
snippets.conflict_hook: Plague cult plans to burn barge, believing it hides chosen vectors. Needs investigators to expose cultists.

snippets.excerpt: Warforged Gossipwright installs resonant crystals in taverns to capture oral history. Speaks using stitched-together tavern voices. Offers playback illusions as evidence. Drinks espresso mixed with oil.
snippets.conflict_hook: Tyrant wants recordings erased before rebellion trial. Needs safe houses for memory crystals. Can replay key scenes.
